locations.name: Music and Mountains, GK
locations.description: As harrowing as the date turned out to be, I wouldn't want to forget a single second of it. Everything was perfect, I had you by my side, you looked beautiful, and the food was amazing.

locations.name: Big Chill Cafe, Kailash Colony Market, GK1
locations.description: Probably our most visited food chain, maybe after Chili's?

locations.name: JNU
locations.description: I could be considered a JNU student. Miss the campus though.

locations.name: Kiran Nadar Museum of Art, Saket
locations.description: Cute date turned into big fight later because of me :(

locations.name: Lama, Hauz Khas
locations.description: Major missing ema datshi

locations.name: Leos Pizza, Vasant Vihar
locations.description: Remember the cherry tomato heart I laid out for you?

locations.name: L' Opera, Vasant Vihar
locations.description: Had the most expensive pastry of our lives.

locations.name: Sundar Nursery
locations.description: Such a cute core memory, and I totally didn't call the driver baby.

locations.name: The Local Cafe, GK1
locations.description: I just remember how beautiful you looked.

locations.name: Nizamuddin Dargah
locations.description: Not you calling me by my name loudly to fit in.

locations.name: Kori's, GK
locations.description: Where my shrimp tempura obsession began.

locations.name: First Bnb
locations.description: It was perfect. I saw you for the first time ever. You were everything I dreamed of.

locations.name: Lodhi Colony
locations.description: I mean just look at you here.

locations.name: PAUL, One Horizon Center, Gurgaon
locations.description: Stays in Gurgaon were so memorable. I had the best few days of my life with you each time.

locations.name: Piano Man, Gurgaon
locations.description: Probably not the music we expected, but this was always something that you wanted to do. And I wanted to take you there soo bad.

locations.name: Nandi Hills
locations.description: Imagine a trip like this, only it doesn't just last one day. Us when?

locations.name: Kaavu, Nallurhalli
locations.description: Vietnamese curry rice was peak food.

locations.name: Indiranagar
locations.description: Felt like we were here every other day.

locations.name: Peck, Koramangala
locations.description: Peck, or was it Felt?

locations.name: Koreyaki, Indiranagar
locations.description: My ramen paglu baby

locations.name: Gillys Super Club, St Marks Road
locations.description: I love you for bearing with me on this

locations.name: Chez Mariannick Bakery, Siddapura
locations.description: Found and popularized by you.

locations.name: Nallurhalli
locations.description: Your second home

locations.name: Farmhouse Kitchen and Bakery, Whitefield
locations.description: Mid food but great photos. Also, fuck anyone who ruins my baby's birthday.

description: Place is open for discussion, but vacation pe jaana hai with you, so bad.
